Telegram

Telegram has its own inbuilt theme engine. You can get themes for that here.

Reporting bugs

Before reporting any bugs, make sure you are using the latest version of Substratum! Also try uninstalling and re-installing the theme, and rebooting your device, as this might resolve some issues. Additionally, make sure you are using the right variants!

When reporting bugs, please provide the following information:

  • ROM Version (stock ROM/custom ROM (which one)), Android version (?attr/androidVersion), release date for custom ROMs
  • Do you have full Substratum/OMS support or are you running Substratum in legacy mode?
  • Substratum version: ?attr/substratumVersion
  • Version of this theme: ?attr/themeVersion
  • The variants you selected
  • Information about your issue:
    1. If some colors are odd/texts are unreadable, please provide a screenshot and describe where it was taken!
    2. If an app crashes, please provide a logcat

Be nice! You don't pay me anything, and I don't feel the need to fix everything you tell me to; especially if you're not being friendly! Also, don't expect any response if you haven't provided the above listed relevant information!

Keep in mind that if you\'re not using a Substratum supported ROM, my means of providing support and fixing bugs are rather limited.

There are two ways to report bugs:

  1. Send me an email (please put some text in the title so I know what the mail is about; I do more in my life than this theme)
  2. Create an issue on the github page, or update an existing one
Don't report bugs by writing it in a review on google play, it's unlikely that I will look into it this way! REVIEWS ARE NOT FOR BUG REPORTS!

Source code

This theme was made open source, so anybody has the possibility to improve it to their likings! Good contributions are welcome! Code can be found on github.
